    • Method Detail

      • action

        protected void action()
        Description copied from class: Gizmo
        Performs the action of the gizmo This is called by the update method and should be overridden by individual gizmos. By default this does nothing, so it should be overridden to make things more interesting This action is interested in the triggeredPercentage value.
        Overrides:
        action in class Gizmo

      • addBall

        public void addBall(IBall ball)
        Description copied from interface: IGizmo
        Add the ball to the list of balls gizmo knows about All balls are removed if an action uses them
        Specified by:

        Overrides:
        addBall in class Gizmo
        Parameters:
        ball - the ball to add

        public void setCollisionDetails()
